subject: 12-820 Random channel lock even when mute cut?
author: wgungfu
full_text:
I cut the mute cable on a 12-820 and had it cycle through.  Every so
often, it'll still lock on a random channel for like a second or so
and then start the sweep again.  On one of the FM sweeps it actually
locked in on a "not in tune" channel permanently. Anyone else have
this happen?


Marty
